overview: libev is a high-performance event loop that provides a full-featured alternative to the event loop provided by the standard C library. It is designed for high scalability and low latency applications.
core_features: Supports multiple event types including I/O events, signal events, and timer events
Efficient and scalable event processing using optimized data structures
Supports priority queues for event scheduling
Provides a simple and easy-to-use interface for event handling
Platform-independent and supports multiple operating systems
